unnormalised: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) announced adjustments to the reference rates for major foreign currencies today. As of 14/06/2024, the USD/INR rate is fixed at ₹83.20. The EUR/INR rate experienced a slight increase, settling at ₹89.75.
normalised: The Reserve Bank of India (R-B-I) announced adjustments to the reference rates for major foreign currencies today. As of fourteenth june two thousand and twenty four, the U-S-D slash I-N-R rate is fixed at rupee eighty three point two zero. The E-U-R slash I-N-R rate experienced a slight increase, settling at rupee eighty nine point seven five.

unnormalised: The GBP/INR rate has seen a noticeable fluctuation, currently standing at ₹105.50. Meanwhile, the JPY/INR rate is reported at ₹0.53. These rates serve as benchmarks for various financial transactions across the country, impacting importers, exporters, and individuals dealing with foreign exchange. Market analysts predict further adjustments in the coming weeks, influenced by global economic factors.
normalised: The G-B-P slash I-N-R rate has seen a noticeable fluctuation, currently standing at rupee one hundred and five point five zero. Meanwhile, the J-P-Y slash I-N-R rate is reported at rupee zero point five three. These rates serve as benchmarks for various financial transactions across the country, impacting importers, exporters, and individuals dealing with foreign exchange. Market analysts predict further adjustments in the coming weeks, influenced by global economic factors.

unnormalised: The RBI’s press release further stated that these rates are applicable for transactions until the next update, scheduled for 17/06/2024. Exporters are advised to closely monitor these rates, particularly the fluctuations in the USD/INR and EUR/INR pairs, as they significantly impact profitability. For detailed information, individuals can refer to the RBI's official website, rbi.org.in.
normalised: The R-B-I's press release further stated that these rates are applicable for transactions until the next update, scheduled for seventeenth june two thousand and twenty four. Exporters are advised to closely monitor these rates, particularly the fluctuations in the U-S-D slash I-N-R and E-U-R slash I-N-R pairs, as they significantly impact profitability. For detailed information, individuals can refer to the R-B-I's official website, r-b-i dot org dot in.
